entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
